message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $125. This is as low as I can go. If you're still interested, I'd be happy to make a deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
